name: gymsystem
description: Sistema de GestiÃ³n de Gimnasio Modular Avanzado

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:member"
scripts.dev:desktop: cd desktop && npm run tauri dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../member-app && npm install && cd ../desktop && npm install
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && .\venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:member

author: GymSystem Team
